FuncDef: The reset anti-attack statistics command clears statistics about attack defense. The reset anti-attack statistics command clears statistics about attack defense.
CLIs: reset anti-attack statistics [ abnormal | fragment | tcp-syn | udp-flood | icmp-flood ]

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the statistics about defense against malformed packets.
-

Indicates the statistics about defense against packet fragments.
-

Indicates the statistics about defense against TCP SYN flood.
-

Indicates the statistics about defense against UDP flood.
-

Indicates the statistics about defense against ICMP flood.
-

ExtraInfo: If attack defense type is not specified, statistics about all types of attack defense are cleared.
